A: Type
f: A -> nat
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
============================
forall (n a : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n (ln1 ++ a :: ln2) l t -> (forall n1 : nat, In n1 ln1 -> n1 < a) -> (forall n1 : nat, In n1 ln2 -> n1 <= a) -> (exists ln3 : list nat, ln2 = a :: ln3) \/ (ln1 = nil /\ a = n /\ ln2 = nil) /\ l = t :: nil

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
Inductive height_pred : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := height_pred_nil : forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), height_pred n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t | height_pred_node : forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2) Arguments height_pred _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments height_pred_nil _%nat_scope Arguments height_pred_node _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
height_pred_disj_larger_aux : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> forall (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (a : nat), ln = ln1 ++ a :: ln2 -> (forall n1 : nat, In n1 ln1 -> n1 < a) -> (forall n1 : nat, In n1 ln2 -> n1 <= a) -> (exists ln3 : list nat, ln2 = a :: ln3) \/ ln = n :: nil /\ l = t :: nil
exist_first_max : forall l : list nat, l <> nil -> exists (a : nat) (l1 l2 : list nat), l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l1 -> n1 < a) /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l2 -> n1 <= a)
height_pred_larger_strict : forall (n n1 : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> In n1 ln -> n < n1 \/ ln = n :: nil /\ l = t :: nil
height_pred_larger_ex : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> exists n1 : nat, In n1 ln /\ n <= n1
height_pred_larger : forall (n n1 : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> In n1 ln -> n <= n1
height_pred_ind : forall P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
height_pred_sind : forall P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp, (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
height_pred_node : forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
RingMicromega.extract_hyps_app : forall (C : Type) (cO : C) (l : list (RingMicromega.NFormula C)) (ln1 ln2 : list nat), RingMicromega.extract_hyps cO l (ln1 ++ ln2) = RingMicromega.extract_hyps cO l ln1 ++ RingMicromega.extract_hyps cO l ln2
prod2list_reorder : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (a : nat) (b b1 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list nat) (l3 l4 l5 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l3 -> length l2 = length l4 -> (forall b0 : nat, In b0 l1 -> b0 <= a) -> (forall b0 : nat, In b0 l2 -> b0 <= a) -> permutation (l3 ++ b :: l4) (b1 :: l5) -> ordered (sum_order f) (b1 :: l5) -> exists l6 l7 : list (btree A), length l1 = length l6 /\ length l2 = length l7 /\ permutation (b1 :: l5) (l6 ++ b1 :: l7) /\ prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2) (l6 ++ b1 :: l7) <= prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2) (l3 ++ b :: l4)
prod2list_reorder2 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (a : nat) (b c b1 c1 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list nat) (l3 l4 l5 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l3 -> length l2 = length l4 -> (forall b0 : nat, In b0 l1 -> b0 <= a) -> (forall b0 : nat, In b0 l2 -> b0 <= a) ->...-> exists l6 l7 : list (btree A), length l1 = length l6 /\ length l2 = length l7 /\ permutation (b1 :: c1 :: l5) (l6 ++ b1 :: c1 :: l7) /\ prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: a :: l2) (l6 ++ b1 :: c1 :: l7) <= prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: a :: l2) (l3 ++ b :: c :: l4)
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
ordered_cover_height_pred : forall (n : nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), ordered_cover l t -> exists ln : list nat, height_pred n ln l t
find_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> code A -> list bool
cover_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), {cover l t} + {~ cover l t}
not_in_find_code : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * list bool)), (forall p : list bool, ~ In (a, p) l) -> find_code eqA_dec a l = nil
height_pred_not_nil2 : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> l <> nil
height_pred_not_nil1 : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> ln <> nil
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
code_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (c : code A) (a : A), {exists l : list bool, In (a, l) c} + {forall l : list bool, ~ In (a, l) c}
find_code_correct1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (b : bool) (l : list bool), find_code eqA_dec a c = b :: l -> In (a, b :: l) c
height_pred_ordered_cover : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> ordered_cover l t
height_pred_length : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> length ln = length l
height_pred_weight : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> n * sum_leaves f t + weight_tree f t = prod2list f ln l
inb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a p : btree A, {inb a p} + {~ inb a p}
cover_all_cover_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), n = length l -> cover l t -> In t (all_cover_aux A l n)
app_inv_app2 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a b : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: b :: l4) \/ l1 = l3 ++ a :: nil /\ l2 = b :: l4
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = a :: nil -> x = nil /\ y = a :: nil \/ x = a :: nil /\ y = nil
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]

``` 
induction n; intros a ln1 ln2 t l H1 H2 H3.
- right. split.
  + destruct ln1.
    * inversion H1.
    * exfalso. apply H2. simpl. left. apply Nat.le_0_l.
  + injection H1 as Hn Ha. subst. symmetry in Ha. apply app_eq_nil in Ha. destruct Ha; split; auto.
- inversion H1. apply height_pred_disj_larger_aux in H; auto. destruct H as [ln3 [H4 H5]]. left; exists ln3; auto.
```

original: induction n; intros a ln1 ln2 t l H1 H2 H3. - right. split. + destruct ln1. * inversion H1. * exfalso. apply H2. simpl. left. apply Nat.le_0_l. + injection H1 as Hn Ha. subst. symmetry in Ha. apply app_eq_nil in Ha. destruct Ha; split; auto. - inversion H1. apply height_pred_disj_larger_aux in H; auto. destruct H as [ln3 [H4 H5]]. left; exists ln3; auto.
